content: Today I just want we guys to know about Block Reward after the next halving, most of us might have known but for the sake of others.Currently, it's no longer a news it's a trend that the next halving  is next year in which most people are looking forward to. HISTORY OF BLOCK REWARDSSource: https://cointelegraph.com/learn/bitcoin-halving-how-does-the-halving-cycle-work-and-why-does-it-matterHowever , the the current block reward for every solution made for minning a block is 6.25BTCs 1BTC = 100,013,802 Sats (varies not stable) 6.25BTC = [(6.25)×(100,013,802)]SatsCurrent Block Reward in Sats6.25BTC = 625,086,262.5Sats(not stable)LinkAfter the halving : From the word half  6.25 x 0.5 (half) The next block reward =  3.125BtcsNext Block Reward in Sats3.125Btcs = 312,543,131.25Sats(not stable)Source: https://tabtrader.com/converter/btc-satstool for  Sats calculation With the block reward tending to be lower there will be more scarcity for BTC and increase in price .Will there be a littlepump???
